ygData.subject: RE: [EQ_Fletchers] Re: Digest Number 43
ygData.msgSnippet: Very cool idea. It probably will not make the list of things to do at Verant but I d say go for it anyways. You never know. Lendl ... From: roleplayer
ygData.messageBody:
Very cool idea. It probably will not make the list of things to do at Verant
but I'd say go for it anyways. You never know.

Lendl

-----Original Message-----
From: roleplayer [mailto:roleplayer@...]
Sent: June 13, 2000 21:11
To: EQ_Fletchers@egroups.com
Subject: [EQ_Fletchers] Re: Digest Number 43


Hi everyone:

I've been battin' this idea around for a few months now, trying to get
Verant to like it, and thought maybe posting it here would help. Here's
what I would like to see:

The ability for fletchers to make specialized magical arrows. By adding a
simple level 1 or 4 spell, you could make 'fire' arrows (with burst of
flame spell added to the mix), 'cold' arrows (shock of frost added),
'poison arrows' (poison bolt added), 'disease' arrows (disease cloud
added), and pure 'magic' arrows, (dunno what to add here, but you get the
point). Maybe to get the enchantments to hold,. you would HAVE to make
these arrows magical in the first place (ie make them with the new silver
tipped arrowheads). The magical arrows Verant introduced were a good first
step, but I think more needs to be done to fletching, in general and
archery in particular. I've got a whole bucket full of ideas for Verant on
that, but that's another Email
